pullRequest.title: Manually starting GPS and opening a recorded track bug fixed. Fixes #200.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Describe the pull request
I've fixed the #200
Only starts a new record if "someone" request it (resume track option is clicked or record button is clicked).
Link to the the issue

nodes.bodyText:

Can we somehow make this easier to read?
